short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps users to use ChatGPT in RTL languages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ChatGPT RTL Enhancer is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to improve the ChatGPT experience for users of right-to-left (RTL) languages such as Hebrew and Arabic. The extension optimizes text alignment and ensures proper formatting for a seamless interaction.

Key Features:

Prompt Input in RTL: align the input text box to RTL when typing in RTL languages, providing a natural writing flow.
Proper Math Equation Formatting: Ensures that math equations are displayed left-to-right (LTR) even when the rest of the text is in RTL, maintaining clarity and readability.

ChatGPT RTL Enhancer combines usability and precision, making conversations in RTL languages intuitive and professional.
